snippet.title: Your Inspiration Roadmap: More Than 60 Ways to Get Motivated
snippet.description:
* Your Inspiration Roadmap: More Than 60 Ways to Get Motivated Francesca Levy July 23, 2013
To do good work, we often reach for a vague thing we call inspiration. It’s hard to pin it down, but you know it when you see it. Inspiration adds joy and meaning to the process of creation, whether you’re producing an aria or a PowerPoint presentation. Sounds simple enough. So why is it that some of us are visited by only rare and fleeting spurts of inspiration, while others seem permanently driven by a grand sense of purpose? The answer may lie partly in demographics.
